title: AI-Q Knowledge Library System Implementation Plan
description: Comprehensive implementation roadmap for the AI-Q Knowledge Library System using modern tech stack with Jotai, ChromaDB, Meilisearch, and Neo4j

phases.title: Foundation & AKU System
phases.description: Establish the core AKU schema, content analyzer, migration tools, and Jotai state management system

milestones.title: AKU schema defined and validated
milestones.description: Complete TypeScript interfaces and validation for Atomic Knowledge Units

milestones.title: Content analyzer processes 100% of existing docs
milestones.description: Migration tool successfully processes all existing markdown documentation

milestones.title: Migration tool successfully converts 50+ AKUs
milestones.description: Convert existing documentation into AKU format with proper relationships

milestones.title: Jotai state management working with complex relationships
milestones.description: Atomic state management system handling AKU relationships and dependencies

tasks.title: Define AKU schema and TypeScript interfaces
tasks.description: Create comprehensive TypeScript interfaces for Atomic Knowledge Units with all required fields

tasks.title: Create content analyzer for existing markdown files
tasks.description: Build tool to parse existing markdown documentation and extract AKU candidates

tasks.title: Build migration tools for AKU conversion
tasks.description: Create automated tools to convert existing documentation into AKU format

tasks.title: Implement Jotai state management with atomic relationships
tasks.description: Set up Jotai atoms for managing AKU state and complex relationship graphs

phases.title: Database & Storage
phases.description: Set up ChromaDB, Meilisearch, Neo4j, and IndexedDB for comprehensive data storage and retrieval

milestones.title: ChromaDB storing and retrieving AKU embeddings
milestones.description: Vector database setup for AKU embeddings and similarity search

milestones.title: Meilisearch providing fast search across all AKUs
milestones.description: Full-text search engine configured for AKU content and metadata

milestones.title: Neo4j graph showing AKU relationships
milestones.description: Knowledge graph database displaying AKU relationships and dependencies

milestones.title: State persistence working across browser sessions
milestones.description: IndexedDB integration for browser extension state persistence

tasks.title: Set up ChromaDB with Docker and configuration
tasks.description: Configure ChromaDB container with proper settings for AKU embeddings

tasks.title: Configure Meilisearch for AKU search functionality
tasks.description: Set up Meilisearch with custom ranking and filtering for AKU content

tasks.title: Implement Neo4j graph database with AKU relationships
tasks.description: Create Neo4j schema and queries for AKU relationship management

tasks.title: Create IndexedDB persistence layer for browser extension
tasks.description: Implement IndexedDB storage for browser extension state and AKU cache

phases.title: API & KLF Integration
phases.description: Implement KLF protocol, GraphQL API, AKU composition engine, and cross-node communication

milestones.title: KLF API responding to discovery requests
milestones.description: Kind Link Framework protocol implementation for AKU discovery

milestones.title: GraphQL queries returning AKU data
milestones.description: GraphQL schema and resolvers for AKU queries and mutations

milestones.title: AKU composition working for simple workflows
milestones.description: Engine for composing AKUs into executable workflows

milestones.title: Cross-node communication established
milestones.description: KLF-based communication between different AI-Q nodes

tasks.title: Implement KLF protocol with message types and routing
tasks.description: Create KLF message types, routing system, and protocol handlers

tasks.title: Create GraphQL schema for AKU queries and mutations
tasks.description: Design and implement GraphQL schema for AKU operations

tasks.title: Build AKU composition engine for workflow creation
tasks.description: Create engine that can compose multiple AKUs into executable workflows

tasks.title: Establish cross-node communication via KLF
tasks.description: Implement communication protocols between different AI-Q nodes

phases.title: Frontend & UI
phases.description: Build React components with Jotai state management, AKU viewer, search interface, and browser extension integration

milestones.title: AKU viewer displaying complete information
milestones.description: React component for viewing AKU details and relationships

milestones.title: Search functionality working with filters
milestones.description: Search interface with Meilisearch integration and filtering

milestones.title: AKU composer creating valid workflows
milestones.description: Visual composer for creating AKU workflows

milestones.title: Browser extension integration complete
milestones.description: Full browser extension integration with cross-tab communication

tasks.description: Create React components using Jotai for atomic state management

tasks.description: Create component for viewing AKU details and relationship graphs

tasks.description: Build search UI with Meilisearch backend and filtering options

dependencies.description: Docker environment setup for database containers

risks.description: Technical complexity of integrating multiple databases and state management systems
risks.mitigation: Start with Phase 1 foundation and validate each component before proceeding

risks.description: Database integration challenges with ChromaDB, Meilisearch, and Neo4j
risks.mitigation: Use Docker containers for consistent development environment

risks.description: Performance optimization requirements for browser extension
risks.mitigation: Implement performance monitoring early and optimize incrementally

risks.description: Browser extension limitations for cross-tab communication
risks.mitigation: Test cross-tab communication thoroughly and implement fallbacks
